name: Waiter (Octogames - Game Developer)
description:
This is a demo, the full version will be available on Steam.

Weiter -  is a colorful platformer with a wide variety of game mechanics and enemies, as well as battles with insidious bosses.

The game takes place in a world where geometric figures live, and the evil Hexagon king rules this world, he divided his kingdom into regions by types of figures. Each region is ruled by his vassals. Weiter decides to put an end to his rule and bring order to a world where equality and order will reign.

In this not an easy adventure, you will need to go through all areas of the geometry world, avoid all traps, find the right path, overthrow the king's vassals and fight him in the final battle. Will our hero be able to overcome all obstacles and defeat the enemies?

- Dynamic gameplay, the hero has a lot of abilities

- Colorful detailed sprite graphics

- A variety of enemies, in each area the player is waiting for his trials and his enemies

- Contains hardcore elements that not every player can

- The game contains many references to various games

There is a big world waiting for you in the game, with a variety of levels

As well as cool boss battles, each boss is unique has its own weaknesses and requires a special approach

The game is being developed by one person – Dmitry Uvarov, the developer is an ardent gamer and strives to create projects that will be interesting to play, with cool characters, cool gameplay. The game is being developed without the support of the publisher, programming, graphics and all other authorship of the developer, not counting borrowing in the form of references to other games.

The game may freeze in the browser, download on PC!
